If length isn’t an issue for you, the blouse appears to be good quality. I’m such a fan of this blouse by Timeson that I am actually wearing it as I write this review. It is so comfortable and flattering that it has become my go to top whenever I want to look casual chic. Currently I am mostly pairing it with jeans and boots. I love the 3/4 sleeves, the fact that it is lined with a breathable soft fabric, and the overall length will cover all sins! Ha ha  🌱 It really is an easy blouse to wear especially on those days where you might feel a little bloated or know if you know are going to eat too much at the family cookout. I sized up to a medium based on reviews and I’m happy I did. It fits perfectly. The quality of fabric and construction feels like a much more expensive garment. It also washes well but I would recommend hang drying. Great top, great value….love it!!!
